function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"No disclosure of competing financial interests or personal relationships","Impact":"Potential bias in the work reported","Mitigation":"Require authors to disclose any potential conflicts of interest","Technologies":"Disclosure forms, conflict of interest policies","People":"Authors, researchers, research institutions","Owner":"Research institutions, academic journals"},{"Description":"Use of * for experimental/laboratory studies without specifying the building type","Impact":"Unclear application of findings to built environments","Mitigation":"Require specificity in the description of the building type in study protocols","Technologies":"Standardized study protocols, building type categorization","People":"Researchers, authors","Owner":"Research institutions, academic journals"}]}
